io.spine.server

Class BoundedContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.BoundedContextBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging

    public final class BoundedContextBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.spine.logging.Logging
    A builder for producing BoundedContext instances.

      • enrichEventsUsing

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder enrichEventsUsing(EventEnricher enricher)
        Sets a custom Enricher for events posted to the EventBus of the context being built.

        If the Enricher is not set, the enrichments will NOT be supported in this context.

        Parameters:
        enricher - the Enricher for events or null if enrichment is not supported

      • eventEnricher

        public java.util.Optional<EventEnricher> eventEnricher()
        Obtains EventEnricher assigned to the context to be built, or empty Optional if no enricher was assigned prior to this call.

      • setTenantIndex

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder setTenantIndex(TenantIndex tenantIndex)

      • addCommandDispatcher

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder addCommandDispatcher(CommandDispatcher commandDispatcher)
        Adds the passed command dispatcher to the dispatcher registration list which will be processed after the Bounded Context is created.
        API Note:
        This method is also capable of registering repositories that implement CommandDispatcher, but the BoundedContextBuilder.add(Repository) method should be preferred for this purpose.

      • addCommandFilter

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder addCommandFilter(BusFilter<CommandEnvelope> filter)
        Adds a filter for commands.

        The order of appending the filters to the builder is the order of the filters in the CommandBus.

      • addCommandListener

        public BoundedContextBuilder addCommandListener(Listener<CommandEnvelope> listener)
        Adds a listener for commands posted to the CommandBus of the context being built.

      • addEventDispatcher

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder addEventDispatcher(EventDispatcher eventDispatcher)
        Adds the passed event dispatcher to the dispatcher registration list which will be processed after the Bounded Context is created.
        API Note:
        This method is also capable of registering repositories that implement EventDispatcher, but the BoundedContextBuilder.add(Repository) method should be preferred for this purpose.

      • addEventFilter

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder addEventFilter(BusFilter<EventEnvelope> filter)
        Adds a filter for events.

        The order of appending the filters to the builder is the order of the filters in the EventBus.

        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to add

      • addEventListener

        public BoundedContextBuilder addEventListener(Listener<EventEnvelope> listener)
        Adds a listener of the events posted to the EventBus of the context being built.

public BoundedContextBuilder remove(Repository<?,?> repository)

      • repositories

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Repository<?,?>> repositories()
        Obtains the list of repositories added to the builder by the time of the call.

        Adding repositories to the builder after this method returns will not update the returned list.

      • commandDispatchers

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<CommandDispatcher> commandDispatchers()
        Obtains the list of command dispatchers added to the builder by the time of the call.

        Adding dispatchers to the builder after this method returns will not update the returned list.

      • eventDispatchers

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<EventDispatcher> eventDispatchers()
        Obtains the list of event dispatchers added to the builder by the time of the call.

        Adding dispatchers to the builder after this method returns will not update the returned list.

      • setAggregateRootDirectory

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public BoundedContextBuilder setAggregateRootDirectory(java.util.function.Supplier<AggregateRootDirectory> directory)
        Sets the supplier of AggregateRootDirectory-s to use in the built context.

        By default, an in-mem implementation is used.

        Parameters:
        directory - the supplier of aggregate root directories

      • systemFeatures

        public SystemSettings systemFeatures()
        Obtains the system context feature configuration.

        Users may enable or disable some features of the system context.

        See Also:
        SystemSettings

      • build

        public BoundedContext build()
        Creates a new instance of BoundedContext with the set configurations.

        The resulting domain-specific Bounded Context has as internal System Bounded Context. The entities of the System domain describe the entities of the resulting Bounded Context.

        The System Bounded Context shares some configuration with the Domain Bounded Context, such as:

        • BoundedContextBuilder.tenantIndex() tenancy;
        • ServerEnvironment.transportFactory() transport facilities.

        All the other configuration is NOT shared.

        The name of the System Bounded Context is derived from the name of the Domain Bounded Context.

        Returns:
        new BoundedContext
